name: Alpha2 Alphanumeric Uppercase Encoder
author: pusscat <pusscat@metasploit.com>
skylined <skylined@edup.tudelft.nl>
description:
Encodes payloads as alphanumeric uppercase text.  This encoder uses
        SkyLined's Alpha2 encoding suite.
        A pure alpha encoder is impossible without having a register that points at or near the shellcode.
        In a default configuration the first few bytes at the beginning are an fnstenv getpc stub (the same as used in shikata_ga_nai) and thus are not alphanumeric.
        You can set BufferRegister for full alpha (see Encoder options for details).

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: BufferRegister
options.description: The register that points to the encoded payload

options.name: BufferOffset
options.description: The offset to the buffer from the start of the register

options.name: AllowWin32SEH
options.description: Use SEH to determine the address of the stub (Windows only)
